title: Forspoken Delayed, PlayStation State of Play Coming? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.07.22
description:
Blessing and Tim talk about Forspoken being delayed, a rumored State of Play, and more.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:08:00 - Housekeeping
Our 4-way SIFU race is up right now. It’s me, Tim, Barrett, and Andy going head to head to head to head in a race to beat every single boss in Sifu. It comes down to the wire so you don’t wanna miss it. You can catch that right now on https://youtu.be/P8VBoVkhjGs
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Gordon McGuire, FargoBrady, & Pranksy
The Roper Report  -
00:10:47 - Forspoken is delayed
00:20:35 - PlayStation is reportedly planning to hold its next showcase this month - Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:35:50 - Ad
00:40:55 - GMG Union wins fairer contracts for G/O Media workers - Marie Dealessandri @ GiBiz
00:44:38 - Take-Two halts sales, marketing and more in Russia and Belarus - James Batchelor @ GiBiz
00:47:50 - Glover is coming to Steam - Jordan Middler @ VGC
00:00:52 11- Out today
00:56:30 - Squad Up:Bryan Lally(Ps5, PC) - Lallysup
01:00:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Gary

Blessing and Tim talk about Forspoken being delayed, a rumored State of Play, and more.

00:08:00 - Housekeeping

Our 4-way SIFU race is up right now. It’s me, Tim, Barrett, and Andy going head to head to head to head in a race to beat every single boss in Sifu. It comes down to the wire so you don’t wanna miss it. You can catch that right now on https://youtu.be/P8VBoVkhjGs
